title: Battery Doubler 1.2.1
description:
Battery Doubler 1.2.1

Increase your battery&#039;s autonomy
What if we told you that you can make your battery to last at least a 50% more 
and you&#039;ll not notice it in your laptop performance? Dachshund Software has 
developed a program which can double your battery&#039;s autonomy.

Forget about buying that new battery, now you can enjoy your laptop for more 
time just installing this lite piece of software.

Battery Doubler turns off what you are not using and by that way it achieves 
to enlarge your battery life. Not only does it enlarge your battery&#039;s autonomy 
but it also recalibrate damaged batteries. When you have been using your battery 
for a long time and you don&#039;t care about the charging cycles, its performance 
becomes lower, but thanks to Battery Doubler you will be able to have it restored.

Finally, you will not have to configure anything because it is preconfigured and 
ready to run!

OS: Windows 95/98/98SE/Me/NT/2000/XP

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

Extract with Winrar.
Install.
Run the patch.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE SEED WHEN YOU FINISH THE DOWNLOAD.

Enjoy!!
